Question: ViviScore Composer CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
ViviScore Composer

CES 2024

- ViviScore Composer showcased at CES 2024
- AI-powered music composition software
- Advanced algorithms for creating original music
- User-friendly interface for composers and musicians
- Integration with popular music production software
- Real-time feedback and suggestions for enhancing compositions
